response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for us and has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, we believe it would be an invaluable addition to your collection or operations. We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special price of $1,200,000, aiming to provide you with a significant advantage compared to the market value of $1,500,000. This exclusive opportunity is tailored to ensure that you receive the best possible deal while securing a long-term partnership with us. Please let us know if you have any questions or require further details about the product. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1200000}
